description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the Russell 1000® Enhanced Value Equal Weight Index (the "underlying index").
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in securities that comprise the underlying index. The underlying index is a subset of the Russell 1000, which measures the performance of the large-cap segment of the U.S. equity universe. The fund is non-diversified.
